realEstate.title: Real Estate and Construction Law
realEstate.description: Complete legal advisory in real estate transactions, rental contracts, licensing and sector company advisory.
realEstate.features: Real estate purchase and sale monitoring|Rental contract preparation|Urban licensing and regularization|Real estate company advisory
realEstate.application: For investors, individuals and companies seeking legal security in real estate matters.

foreignLegalization.title: Foreign Legalization
foreignLegalization.description: Complete guidance in obtaining visas, residence and tax benefits for foreigners in Portugal.
foreignLegalization.features: Obtaining residence visas|Investment Residence Authorization (Golden Visa)|Family reunification|Non-Habitual Resident Tax Regime (NRH)
foreignLegalization.application: For foreigners who wish to regularize their situation in Portugal through residence, investment or tax benefits.

portugueseNationality.title: Portuguese Nationality
portugueseNationality.description: Complete support in the process of obtaining Portuguese citizenship and judicial recognition of family relationships.
portugueseNationality.features: Acquisition of nationality by descent or marriage|Transcription of marriages and births|Judicial recognition of de facto union
portugueseNationality.application: For foreigners eligible for Portuguese nationality or legal recognition of family relationships.

commercialLaw.title: Commercial and Corporate Law
commercialLaw.description: Legal structuring for companies, mergers, dissolutions and corporate litigation.
commercialLaw.features: Company incorporation|Mergers, divisions and transformations|Dissolution and liquidation of companies|Corporate litigation
commercialLaw.application: For entrepreneurs and companies seeking legal structuring or corporate reorganization.

criminalLaw.title: Criminal and Administrative Offense Law
criminalLaw.description: Criminal defense and administrative offense challenges focused on protecting client rights.
criminalLaw.features: Defense in criminal proceedings|Administrative offense challenges|Administrative and judicial appeals
criminalLaw.application: For clients involved in investigations, criminal proceedings or administrative fines.

familyLaw.title: Family and Succession Law
familyLaw.description: Judicial or extrajudicial resolution of family matters, successions and parental regulation.
familyLaw.features: Inventory and asset division|Parental responsibility regulation|Custody and alimony proceedings|Succession litigation
familyLaw.application: For families seeking to resolve legal disputes over inheritances, divorces or parental responsibilities.

registriesNotary.title: Registries and Notary
registriesNotary.description: Document authentication, public records and general notarial acts.
registriesNotary.features: Signature and translation authentication|Real estate, commercial and civil records|Preparation of authenticated private documents|Heir qualification
registriesNotary.application: For individuals and companies who need legal validation of documents or public records.

ProfileSection.title: Lawyer in
ProfileSection.description1: Professional with over 10 years of experience in Portuguese law, dedicated to offering personalized legal solutions and results for clients.
ProfileSection.description2: My approach combines legal rigor with empathy, ensuring that each client receives not only legal representation but also clear and transparent guidance at every stage of the process.

ServicesSection.subtitle: Specialized legal solutions focused on exceptional results and comprehensive protection of your interests

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: 100% transparent communication about your legal case. You will always be informed about the process status and next steps, without bureaucracy or unnecessary legal jargon.

strategy.title: Personalized Strategy
strategy.description: Each client receives a legal strategy developed specifically for their situation. We carefully analyze each case to create effective solutions tailored to your needs.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Our focus is on obtaining concrete and lasting results for our clients. We work not just for processes, but for real solutions that improve your legal situation.

excellence.title: Recognized Excellence
excellence.description: More than a decade of experience resolving the most complex cases in Portuguese law. Our reputation was built through consistent results and impeccable ethical conduct.

Process.methodology: Clear, transparent methodology focused on results

consultation.title: Initial Consultation
consultation.description: Detailed analysis of your case in a confidential and no-obligation consultation.

strategy.title: Legal Strategy
strategy.description: Development of personalized strategy adapted to your needs.

execution.title: Professional Execution
execution.description: Rigorous implementation with transparency and continuous communication.

results.title: Guaranteed Result
results.description: Effective conclusion focused on concrete solutions and protection of your rights.

FAQ.subtitle: The most common questions our clients ask us

questions.question: How does the first consultation work?
questions.answer: In this meeting, we will listen carefully to your case, clarify your doubts, and explain the possible legal strategies. You will leave this consultation with a clear understanding of your options.

questions.question: What are the legal fees?
questions.answer: Fees are defined according to the complexity of the case and the type of service required. After the initial consultation, I will present a detailed proposal with all involved costs, without surprises. I work with total transparency in all financial aspects.

questions.question: Can I schedule a consultation in Portimão?
questions.answer: Yes, I personally attend at my office in Portimão, located in the city center. I also offer videoconference consultations for clients throughout the Algarve region and the rest of World.

questions.question: How long does it take to resolve a case?
questions.answer: The time varies according to the complexity of the case and the court involved. During the initial consultation, I can provide a realistic estimate based on my experience of more than 10 years in the Portuguese legal system.

questions.question: Do I need documents for the first consultation?
questions.answer: It's useful to bring any documents related to your case, but it's not mandatory. Even without documents, I can assess your situation and guide you on which documents will be needed to proceed.

Privacy.pageSubtitle: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our legal services to you. This includes both information you provide directly and information collected automatically.

points.identification: Identification information such as your name, date of birth, nationality, and government-issued identification numbers
points.contact: Contact details including postal address, telephone number, email address, and preferred method of communication
points.professional: Professional information including employment details, company affiliations, and industry sector
points.communications: Content of communications with us, including emails, letters, phone calls, and meeting notes

points.device: Device information such as IP address, browser type, operating system, and mobile device identifiers
points.browsing: Browsing activity including pages visited, time spent on pages, navigation paths, and click patterns
points.interactions: Interaction data with our website features, forms, and online services

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect for specific purposes related to our legal practice and client service obligations.

points.services: Providing legal advice, representation, and professional services tailored to your specific needs
points.support: Offering ongoing client support, case updates, and responsive communication throughout the legal process
points.communication: Maintaining accurate client records and facilitating effective communication channels

points.analysis: Analyzing usage patterns and feedback to enhance our legal expertise and service delivery
points.personalization: Customizing website content and service recommendations based on your preferences and requirements
points.optimization: Optimizing website performance, security measures, and user experience continuously

dataProtection.title: Data Protection and Security
dataProtection.content: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

points.encryption: Advanced encryption technology for data transmission and secure storage of sensitive client information
points.accessControl: Strict access controls limiting data access to authorized personnel only with role-based permissions
points.regularAudits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments to maintain highest protection standards

points.duration: Retention of personal data for legally required periods as mandated by Portuguese law and professional regulations
points.deletion: Secure deletion of data beyond retention periods unless longer storage is required by law
points.requirements: Compliance with professional obligations and legal requirements for record keeping

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We respect your privacy and only share your information under specific circumstances in accordance with legal and professional obligations.

points.serviceProviders: Sharing with trusted third-party service providers who assist in our operations and are contractually bound to confidentiality
points.legalRequirements: Disclosure when required by law, court order, or regulatory authority within legal compliance frameworks
points.businessTransfers: Transfer in connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, with appropriate protections maintained

points.selling: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes
points.marketing: We do not use your information for unsolicited commercial communications or promotional activities
points.unauthorized: We do not disclose your information without proper authorization or legal requirement

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.content: You have specific rights regarding your personal information under Portuguese data protection laws and GDPR regulations.

points.information: Right to request information about what personal data we hold about you and how it is processed
points.correction: Right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information we hold about you
points.deletion: Right to request deletion of your personal data when it is no longer necessary for specified purposes

points.email: You may contact us at privacy@nadinezeverino.com for privacy-related inquiries
points.responseTime: We aim to respond to privacy requests within 30 days of receipt
points.assistance: Our Data Protection Officer is available to assist with privacy concerns and exercise of rights

contact.title: Questions About Your Privacy?
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or concerns about how your personal information is handled, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Cookies.pageSubtitle: Learn how we use cookies to enhance your browsing experience

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content1: This Cookie Policy explains how Nadine Isabel Zeverino Advogada ('we', 'us', or 'our') uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website. By continuing to browse our website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.
introduction.content2: We reserve the right to update this Cookie Policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They enable websites to store information or functionality and help improve your browsing experience.

howTheyWork.title: How Cookies Work
howTheyWork.storage: Stored in your browser's temporary memory or permanently on your device
howTheyWork.retrieval: Automatically sent back to the originating website on subsequent visits
howTheyWork.session: Session cookies expire when you close your browser
howTheyWork.persistence: Persistent cookies remain until they expire or are manually deleted

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are strictly necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas.

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.description: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often and if they receive error messages.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.description: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, personalized features during your visit.

examples.chat: Live chat and customer support tools

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements more relevant to you and your interests. They also limit the number of times you see an advertisement.

examples.personalized: Personalized advertising based on your profile

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze site performance, and provide personalized content. Here are the main purposes:

browser.title: Browser Settings
browser.description: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can block or delete cookies, though this may affect website functionality.

steps.settings: Access your browser's settings or preferences menu
steps.cookies: Find the privacy or cookies section
steps.preferences: Adjust your cookie preferences and settings
steps.save: Save your changes and restart your browser

consent.title: Cookie Consent Manager
consent.description: We provide a cookie consent banner on our website where you can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

steps.banner: Look for the cookie consent banner on our website
steps.preferences: Click on 'Manage Preferences' or similar option
steps.selection: Select which types of cookies you accept
steps.confirm: Confirm your selections and continue browsing

rights.title: Your Cookie Rights
rights.content: You have the right to know about our use of cookies and to manage your preferences. If you have questions about this Cookie Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us.

ContactForm.title: Send a Message
ContactForm.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We will contact you soon.
ContactForm.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again.
